physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient was overweight. No other significant physical examination findings reported.

physical_examinations.date: After Poor Compliance and Third Episode of Pancreatitis
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Significant improvement in lipid profile noted after adherence to insulin and hypolipidemic treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially poor compliance led to high plasma triglycerides; improved compliance resulted in significant reduction in plasma triglyceride levels.
